CreditMemoInvApplication.name: CreditMemoInvApplication
CreditMemoInvApplication.description: Represents an amount applied from a credit memo to an invoice.

Amount.description: The amount of the credit memo that was applied to or unapplied from the invoice.

AppliedDate.description: The date when the credit memo was applied. If the credit memo invoice application's type is Unapplied, this value is inherited from the Applied date of the credit memo referenced in the AssociatedLineId.

AssociatedLineId.description: For a credit memo invoice application that represents an unapplied credit memo, this field shows the original credit memo invoice application.

CreditMemoBalance.description: The balance of a credit memo after a credit memo is applied or unapplied. This field is a snapshot of the credit memo's balance after the action. It isn't updated after further changes to the credit memo balance.

CreditMemoId.description: The credit memo that was applied or unapplied.

CreditMemoInvoiceNumber.description: Number of the invoice to which a credit memo is applied.

Date.description: Date when the credit memo amount was applied to the invoice.

Description.description: Description of the credit applied to an invoice.

EffectiveDate.description: The effective date of the application or unapplication of credit. Users can provide this value when applying or unapplying the credit memo. This field is optional and provided only for reporting purposes. It doesn't affect the credit memo invoice application's other fields.

HasBeenUnapplied.description: Shows whether this credit memo application has been unapplied from the target invoice.

ImpactAmount.description: The net adjustment to the invoice's balance after a credit memo is applied or unapplied. If a credit memo was applied, this value is the negative version of the credit memo invoice application's Amount. If a credit memo was unapplied, this value is the positive version of the credit memo invoice application's Amount.

InvoiceBalance.description: The balance of the credit memo after a credit memo is applied or unapplied. This field is a snapshot of the credit memo's balance after the action. It isn't updated after further changes to the credit memo balance.

InvoiceId.description: ID of the invoice to which credit is applied.

Type.description: Indicates whether the credit memo line application was generated because of an apply action (application) or an unapply action (unapplication).

UnappliedDate.description: The date when this application was unapplied from the target invoice.
